channel.title: What are the most underrated games?
channel.description: What are you favorite underrated games? I personally loved Folklore.

item.title: What are the most underrated games?
item.dc:creator: gibbelin
item.description:
Far Cry 2. Yeah, it had some problems, but it was also one of the most immersive games I’ve ever played, and I award very high points for that.

Read full topic

item.title: What are the most underrated games?
item.dc:creator: Rosie
item.description:
these are under rated probably more because of them being small name indie games / nobody has played them, but under rated none the less

The Void (probably one of the hardest games i’ve played)
Winter Voices

also the original Witcher, yeah it got good reviews and awards, but i’m still surprised at how few people have played it.

Read full topic
item.source: What are the most underrated games?

item.title: What are the most underrated games?
item.dc:creator: G-Rona
item.description:
DiePoente:

Dark Messiah of Might and Magic.

I still want a sequel.

SkyBlue:

Indiana Jones and the Emperor’s Tomb, brilliant story, gameplay and graphics (for the time, which still look good today). Though to be fair, it’s one of those games that’s underrated because not many people seem to have played it.

These.

item.description:

item.title: What are the most underrated games?
item.dc:creator: papernick
item.description:
Mented:

Not really. The internet is full of those kinda people, and most people don’t expect the post they are reading to be written by someone who thinks the internet was built to house their kewl jokes with invisible, highlightable sarcasm.

well, black text is usual on these forums

Read full topic
item.source: What are the most underrated games?

item.title: What are the most underrated games?
item.dc:creator: Mented
item.description:
acade366:

Exactly. That’s the point, it was blatantly obvious already without the second sentence.

Not really. The internet is full of those kinda people, and most people don’t expect the post they are reading to be written by someone who thinks the internet was built to house their kewl jokes with invisible, highlightable sarcasm.

Anyway, one of the most underrated games of all time is…

Vampire the Masquerade Bloodlines.

Also, Killzone 1 was an unbelievably underrated title for the PS2, and still imo stands as one of the best FPS for that console.

Oh, another…

ACT OF WAR.

Oh and…

Evil Genius.

Oh and…

Deus Ex I.W.

Oh and…

Tachyon the Fringe.

Oh and… I’l leave it there because I could go on all day.

Game history is full of underappreciated gems that simply got swept under the rug because of the industry always putting too much emphasis on the ‘AAA’ titles, which has pretty much always been the newest FPS to come out and do nothing over the past decade.

One of the few exceptions being Half-Life.

Read full topic
item.source: What are the most underrated games?

item.title: What are the most underrated games?
item.dc:creator: Surplus
item.description:
I didn’t see it, I thought hey this guy can’t be that much of a stupid shit and checked for hidden text.

Why do people on this forum expect people to check for black text? It’s annoying.

So on topic, Mount & Blade is pretty under-rated. Not in terms of like reviews or people thinking its shitty but like a lot of people don’t know about it (I suppose this is the deal with indie games and not having advertizing). If you like open world / sandbox type rpg games M&B is a must play. I bought the first one some time back for 5$ some of the best 5$ I’ve spent.

Read full topic
item.source: What are the most underrated games?

item.title: What are the most underrated games?
item.dc:creator: papernick
item.description:
SURPLUS_NiNjA:
acade365:

Black Ops.

It didn’t get the recognition it deserved; even if it grossed a huge amount of money, call of duty now is like a bad word for “hardcore pc gamers”. It’s even better than MW2, and that was already a great game to begin with.[COLOR=‘Red’]huhuhu

You guys missed something.

at least someone saw that

Read full topic
item.source: What are the most underrated games?

item.title: What are the most underrated games?
item.dc:creator: OldDirtyBastard
item.description:
^do see anyone now giving two shits about them? It’s like it never fucking existed.

Steagle:

Brothers in Arms: Hell’s Highway

It sucked.

Seriously, after showing us those first trailers (which DID seem like it was the next step in the series) - they gave that watered down cheap crap? GTFO whoever is responsible for this.

Dotard:

You got that right bro, now I was like WTF ? Where is Rune 2 after that many years ?! Only a few people know that game but still good one

https://www.1up.com/news/rune-sequel-possibilities

Read full topic
